title: Google\Cloud\Debugger\Debuggee
name: Debuggee
description: This class represents a debuggee - a service that can handle breakpoints.

params.name: info
params.description: Configuration options.

params.name: info.id
params.description: Unique identifier for the debuggee generated by the controller service.

params.name: info.project
params.description: Project the debuggee is associated with. Use the project number when registering a Google Cloud Platform project.

params.name: info.uniquifier
params.description: Debuggee uniquifier within the project. Any string that identifies the application within the project can be used. Including environment and version or build IDs is recommended.

params.name: info.description
params.description: Human readable description of the debuggee. Including a human-readable project name, environment name and version information is recommended.

params.name: info.isInactive
params.description: If set to true, indicates that the debuggee is considered as inactive by the Controller service.

params.name: info.agentVersion
params.description: Version ID of the agent release. The version ID is structured as following: domain/type/vmajor.minor (for example google.com/gcp-java/v1.1).

params.name: info.status
params.description: Human readable message to be displayed to the user about this debuggee. Absence of this field indicates no status. The message can be either informational or an error status.

params.name: info.extSourceContexts
params.description: References to the locations and revisions of the source code used in the deployed application.

params.name: info.labels
params.description: A set of custom debuggee properties, populated by the agent, to be displayed to the user.

methods.name: register
methods.description: Register this debuggee with the Stackdriver backend.

methods.name: breakpoints
methods.description: Fetch the list of breakpoints this debugee should try to handle.

params.name: options
params.description: Configuration options.

params.name: options.waitToken
params.description: A wait token that, if specified, blocks the method call until the list of active breakpoints has changed, or a server selected timeout has expired. The value should be set from the last returned response.

methods.name: breakpointsWithWaitToken
methods.description: Fetch the list of breakpoints this debugee should try to handle and a wait token for the next request. The return value is an associative array with keys of breakpoints and nextWaitToken.

params.name: options
params.description: Configuration options.

params.name: options.waitToken
params.description: A wait token that, if specified, blocks the method call until the list of active breakpoints has changed, or a server selected timeout has expired. The value should be set from the last returned response.

params.name: breakpoint
params.description: The modified breakpoint.

params.name: options
params.description: Configuration options. See Google\Cloud\Core\RequestWrapper::__construct() for configuration options which apply to all network requests.

params.name: path
params.description: Path to the source file.

params.name: line
params.description: Line within the source file.

params.name: options
params.description: Array of Breakpoint constructor arguments. See Google\Cloud\Debugger\Breakpoint::construct() for configuration details. See <a data-custom-type="core/requestwrapper" data-method="construct">Google\Cloud\Core\RequestWrapper::__construct() for configuration options which apply to all network requests.

params.name: breakpoints
params.description: The modified breakpoints.

params.name: options
params.description: Configuration options. See Google\Cloud\Core\RequestWrapper::__construct() for configuration options which apply to all network requests.
